HI Christine,

We confirmed that the part number was updated. This could be a caching issue. We have purged the site's cache on our end. Please clear your browser's cache as well to ensure that you will see the latest version of the page.

Let us know if you need further assistance.
could be a caching issue. i already cleared the cache after i updated the part number.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Hi guys,


Can you please update the part number of the below brochure to 028-6707-02





Thank you,
Christine


From: Shared-Orders-Mailbox Unitron <orders.au@unitron.com>
Sent: Friday, November 10, 2023 12:52 PM
To: Salvador, Christine <Christine.Salvador@unitron.com>
Subject: FW: Brochure Order - Vivante range - 028-6707-02


Hi Christine,


I have been sending a lot of the new Viviante brochures out to clinics and the Territory Managers this week. One of the clinic have reported that they received the old version of the brochure and they want the new version. Please see screen shot below. The Unitron marketing portal shows 028-6764-02. When you download and look at the end of the catalogue it is 028-6707-02. Can you confirm the correct part number


Regards,

Roslyn Eddy
Customer Care Associate
Audiometrist


From: Wendy Priest <Wendy.Priest@nsu.com.au>
Sent: Friday, November 10, 2023 12:33 PM
To: Shared-Orders-Mailbox Unitron <orders.au@unitron.com>
Cc: NSU Cleveland <Cleveland@nsu.com.au>; NSU Greenslopes <greenslopes@nsu.com.au>; NSU Sunnybank <Sunnybank@nsu.com.au>
Subject: RE: Brochure Order - Vivante range


EXTERNAL MAIL

Hi Team

I've received the brochures….but sorry to say, they are the wrong ones. (I received Version 1 of the Vivante brochure).

Was wanting this one ….Version 2 …as below.

Can you please send 50 of these to each of the clinics - Greenslopes, Cleveland, Sunnybank. As I know we'll use them all.

Many thanks
Happy Friday

Wendy





From: Wendy Priest <Wendy.Priest@nsu.com.au>
Sent: Thursday, 9 November 2023 9:57 AM
To: orders.au@unitron.com
Cc: NSU Cleveland <Cleveland@nsu.com.au>; NSU Greenslopes <greenslopes@nsu.com.au>; NSU Sunnybank <Sunnybank@nsu.com.au>
Subject: Brochure Order - Vivante range


Hi Team

Can you please send these to our clinics:-

Sunnybank Clinic
50 x Brochure DL - Welcome to the Vivante experience 028-6707-02/V2.00/2023-11/dr


Greenslopes Clinic

Cleveland Clinic

Thanks
Wendy
